10
11#include "swapyv12buffer.h"
12
13void vp8_swap_yv12_buffer(YV12_BUFFER_CONFIG *new_frame,
14 YV12_BUFFER_CONFIG *last_frame) {
15 unsigned char *temp;
16
17 temp = last_frame->buffer_alloc;
18 last_frame->buffer_alloc = new_frame->buffer_alloc;
19 new_frame->buffer_alloc = temp;
20
21 temp = last_frame->y_buffer;
22 last_frame->y_buffer = new_frame->y_buffer;
23 new_frame->y_buffer = temp;
24
25 temp = last_frame->u_buffer;
26 last_frame->u_buffer = new_frame->u_buffer;
27 new_frame->u_buffer = temp;
28
29 temp = last_frame->v_buffer;
30 last_frame->v_buffer = new_frame->v_buffer;
31 new_frame->v_buffer = temp;
32}
